text: Common issues: DSG gearbox oil changes every 60k km, timing chain tensioner wear on early models, water pump leaks.
Check service history for gearbox oil changes, inspect undercarriage for corrosion, verify all electronics and infotainment work.
EP6 engine timing belt wear, clutch pedal stiffness on manual, minor electrical faults (lights, sensors).
Inspect belt condition, test clutch bite point, confirm software updates applied.
Injector leaks (diesel), steering column noise, minor suspension bush wear.
Check for injector smell under hood, inspect shock absorbers and bushings, verify service book stamped.
Extremely reliable overall; minor recalls for airbag sensors; hybrid battery check after 8 years.
Verify hybrid battery warranty, ensure coolant system and brakes serviced on schedule.
